explains: adv. 温和地；体贴地；柔和地

sentences.en: Mr. White tenderly embraced his wife.
sentences.cn: 怀特先生温柔地拥抱了妻子。

sentences.en: "What a sweet child you are," said the grandmother tenderly.
sentences.cn: “你真是个好孩子。”奶奶温柔地说。

sentences.en: Heidi tenderly caressed first one and then the other, seeming beside herself with joy.
sentences.cn: 海蒂温柔地摸摸这只，又摸摸那只，似乎高兴得忘乎所以。
